meanings.definition: Selfheals (verb): to heal oneself without external assistance
meanings.sent1: After getting a small cut, the body selfheals by forming a scab to protect the wound.
meanings.sent2: When a bone breaks, it selfheals over time by mending itself back together.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's ability to selfheal made them invincible in battles.
meanings.sent4: Just like a magical power, the plant selfheals any damage done to its leaves.
meanings.sent5: The lizard's tail selfheals quickly after being detached from its body.

meanings.definition: Selfheals (noun): a plant of the genus Prunella with healing properties
meanings.sent1: In traditional medicine, selfheals are often used to make herbal remedies for various ailments.
meanings.sent2: The selfheals in the garden are known for their ability to soothe skin irritations.
meanings.sent3: The selfheals in the backyard seem to have a magical touch, healing any plant near them.
meanings.sent4: The selfheals in the forest spread their healing powers to other plants, creating a healing oasis.
meanings.sent5: The selfheals in the herbalist's collection are prized for their potent healing properties.
